title: End of an Era at Quick-Step: Team Chief Patrick Lefevere Steps down after Two Decades of Cobbles and Controversies
content:
Last of the old school? Lefevere steps down from Quick-Step leadership as one of the most successful, if divisive, leaders in the sport: 'A life-changing moment.'

Read the full article at End of an Era at Quick-Step: Team Chief Patrick Lefevere Steps down after Two Decades of Cobbles and Controversies on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
